title-group.article-title: THE STORY OF FRA ANGELICO: REFLECTIONS IN MIRRORS

abstract.p: The study deals with the 'story of Fra Angelico', that is with the shaping of this character from the Quattrocento to the present day. Very little can be known about the artists real life, but we do have a powerful image of him: this image is a mirror of perfection, in line with the medieval tradition of the moral speculum. Vasari s "Life of Fra Angelico", which assimilates the monk-painter to the saints and Christ, is analyzed in detail as a literary construction aimed at providing the model of a perfect Christian artist. It is also related to some works by Fra Angelico, especially the Louvre altarpiece and Jesus among the doctors in the armadio degli argenti. In the latter painting, the figure of a Dominican is analyzed as a self-projection of Fra Angelico that perfectly matches Vasari's image of him.
